title: Vertical run in Pudong
text:
Source: Shanghai Daily | October 26, 2015, Monday | Print Edition 
The 2015 SHKP Vertical Run — Race To Shanghai IFC was held at Lujiazui’s International Financial Center in Pudong yesterday. More than 1,500 runners took part in the competition and climbed a total of 1,460 steps. Piotr Lobodzinski of Poland and China’s Gan Xue won the men’s and women’s elite group titles, respectively. All the registration and sponsorship income will be donated to the Shanghai Children’s Health Foundation. Meanwhile, the inaugural Music Run by AIA was held at Shanghai Oriental Sports Center over the weekend. Thousands of runners took part in the 5-kilometer activity to the accompaniment of various types of background music, including rock, pop, hip hop and dance music.
